00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 
00041 #include "CmdDelete.h"
00042 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00043 #include "SceneModel.h"
00044 
00051 CmdDelete::CmdDelete( const QModelIndex& selectedIndex, SceneModel& model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00052 : QUndoCommand("Delete", parent),  m_coinNode( 0 ), m_coinParent( 0 ), m_pModel(&model), m_row( -1 )
00053 {
00054         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedIndex );
00055         m_coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00056         m_coinNode->ref();
00057         m_coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceNode->GetParent()->GetNode() );
00058         m_row = instanceNode->GetParent()->children.indexOf( instanceNode );
00059 }
00060 
00064 CmdDelete::~CmdDelete()
00065 {
00066         m_coinNode->unref();
00067 }
00068 
00073 void CmdDelete::undo()
00074 {
00075         m_pModel->Paste( tgc::Shared, *m_coinParent, *m_coinNode, m_row );
00076 }
00077 
00082 void CmdDelete::redo( )
00083 {
00084         m_pModel->Cut( *m_coinParent, m_row );
00085 }
